title: Chomsky on the "Limits" of Knowledge (1977)
description:
A few clips of Noam Chomsky discussing the limits of knowledge and thought in a 1977 interview with Bryan Magee, and sounding like a dyed-in-the-wool Kantian in the process. This is a version of an upload from the previous channel. The full interview can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PxvSQnmcYLo

Chomsky-Foucault Debate on Justice & Human Nature: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xpVQ3l5P0A4
